scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: A red leather-bound resolution presented to Mrs. M.G. Spooner on March 7, 1903 by the New York Fire Department of the Boroughs of Brooklyn and Queens for service rendered to the Fund for the Benefit of the Widows and Orphans of New York Firemen. The spine of the volume is decorated with a large red fabric ribbon and bow. The edges of the pages are gilded. Each page has elaborate handwritten text and hand-drawn imagery.
